text: Skazhy: «Nevzhe my budemo zvertatysya zamistʹ Allaha do toho, khto ne prynese nam ni korysti, ni shkody? Nevzhe my vidstupymo pislya toho, yak Allah vkazav nam pryamyy shlyakh, — nache toy, koho zvabyly shaytany na zemli y dovely do sumniviv? U takoho ye druzi, yaki zaklykayutʹ yoho do pryamoho shlyakhu y kazhutʹ: «Idy do nas!» Skazhy: «Voistynu, pryamyy shlyakh vid Allaha — spravzhniy pryamyy shlyakh! I nam nakazano pidkorytysya Hospodu svitiv
